participant_abstract.sent: The meeting perhaps could have been constructed a little better with more use of the powerpoint presentation and the structure laid out in it.
We perhaps went too quickly in to the topic of discussion and should better have used the first meeting as a more general meeting.
However, the ideas being passed around were interesting.
I felt that i made my initial ideas on concept and design early in the meeting and that they were listened to and appreciated.
I tried to concentrate on the design element and how we could make it unique.
The industrial designer did his role well i felt looking into the logistics and weakness of my initial idea.
The project manager could have had perhaps more control and a position of more authority.

participant_actions.sent: To produce and prepare presentations on their roles and their findings.
Marketing to research product, myself to look at technical fucntions of remote.
Not entirely sure what everyone is doing because wasn't made clear in the meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: Ultimately to make easy to use, durable remote with a unique design.

participant_problems.sent: Suggested that should make a universal remote control this is too complex a product i believe.
Finish with clear goals and conclusions and the next step outlined.
